Judul: PROJECT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM DESIGN by UKP4 BASED ON PROJECT MANAGEMENT OFFICE (PMO) (CASE STUDY: DONGGI-SENORO GAS FIELD
Abstrak:
Donggi-Senoro gas field has been found since 30 years ago, but the project has not been monetized. The main constraints of the project came from non-technical (external) factors. UKP4 (Unit Kerja Presiden Bidang Pengawasan dan Pengendalian Pembangunan) as the President's Delivery Unit (PDU) in charge with development monitoring and oversight had to debottleneck the Donggi-Senoro project in order for it to be realized.      
 
 
 

These problems can be solved by performing a comprehensive Project Management Office (PMO) to manage the Donggi-Senoro project. The government's PMO function plays an important role by providing decision support for decision maker and stakeholders involved in the Donggi-Senoro project.      
 
 
 

The methodologies of this final project are observation, internship and also field visit to Donggi-Senoro project. This final project focuses on designing the project management system for UKP4 by using PMO framework.      
 
 
 

The research provides suggestion on PMO functions for UKP4 to manage the project. UKP4 has basically conducted most of the PMO functions, as evidenced from the achievement of gas allocation and FID of Donggi-Senoro project. The proposed PMO design can be applied by UKP4, which is expected to increase the project progress, reduce the constraints on the project, increase and develop internal process, encourages attitude to learn and develop employee capabilities.      
 
 
 

The PMO implementation plan will take approximately 2 years. UKP4 has to prepare all the supporting activities before implementing the PMO system. The supports from top leaders are needed, so PMO system can work properly.
Kata Kunci: Debottleneck, Donggi-Senoro Project, Project Management, Project Management Office (PMO), UKP4
